div.p: Download a copy of this version of the HL7 Terminology so you can host it on your local web site

Download the NPM Packages for this version of the HL7 terminology. Note that NPM packages are usually resolved via the FHIR NPM package system, so it's enough to reference these packages in your dependencies without downloading them
Please note that the Terminology maintained on these pages is for R4 going forward; it is not compatible with R3.

ul.li: hl7.terminology.r4.tgz#{{site.data.fhir.ig.version}} - for R4 tools and implementation guides
hl7.terminology.r5.tgz#{{site.data.fhir.ig.version}} - for R5 tools and implementation guides

div.p: Zip collections of resources, for supporting tools that don't use NPM packages

ul.li: Expansions: JSON, XML (The expansions included in the pages for all value sets that could be expanded)

div.p: The HL7 Version 3 coremif file for this release
